entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
